producttitle: Bell+howell Wp10 Compact Camera - Yellow - 2.4" Lcd (WP10YELLOW)
productname: Splash WP10 12.0 Megapixel Waterproof Digital Camera with 2.4-Inch LCD (Yellow)
marketinginformation: The Bell+Howell WP10 Splash camera is a 12 Mega Pixel waterproof digital camera that is easy to use, compact and handheld. It is waterproof to 10-Feet so you can take it with you to the beach, in the pool, surfing, skiing, boating and standard every day use. Pictures come out clear and vivid with vibrant colors.
